availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Henry Sidle (Pike County, Missouri, farmer)

body.p: Pike County, Missouri, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of George Sidle. Married to Elizabeth Jane Lowry in Pike County, Missouri, on January 14, 1860. Father of Annie M. Sidle and James Homer Sidle. Resident in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 143A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, Pike County, Cuivre, p. 141A.
Missouri Marriage Records, Missouri State Archives, Jefferson City, Missouri, Pike County Marriages, 1825-1865.
Find A Grave, "C. H. Sidle (Birth-Death)," Memorial #179904952, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/179904952 (accessed April 28, 2020).
